text: == Events == * Emperor Claudius marries his niece Agrippina the Younger * Seneca the Younger becomes Nero's tutor * Nero becomes engaged to Claudia Octavia * Roman legion is stationed at the borders of the Silures of South Wales to get ready to invade == Births == * == Deaths == * Ma Yuan, Chinese general of the Han Dynasty (b. 14 BC) Category:40s
